metadata.title: CVE-2021-22116 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: RabbitMQ all versions prior to 3.8.16 are prone to a denial of servicevulnerability due to improper input validation in AMQP 1.0 clientconnection endpoint. A malicious user can exploit the vulnerability bysending malicious AMQP messages to the target RabbitMQ instance having theAMQP 1.0 plugin enabled.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
